string-array.name: menu_descriptions
string-array.item: Award-winning tonkotsu pork-broth prepared in the traditional method. Mouth-wateringly rich, fresh and aromatic; special handcrafted noodles and classic Nagi pork chashu.
Fragrant blackened garlic and squid in a silky broth with succulent chashu; finished with a ball of minced pork, black sesame and Nagi spices.
A striking blend of garlic, chilli oil and cayenne pepper in a velvety broth; topped by a tempting ball of miso-infused minced pork and special Nagi spices with tender chashu.
A fusion of fresh basil and olive oil with delectable tonkotsu broth in a truly unique combination; lavishly garnished with grated parmesan cheese and richly marbled chashu.
Meat and vegetables seasoned with Japanese spices, wrapped in Nagiâ€™s special dough and finished with a crispy lattice skirt.
Nagi\'s gyoza served in a sizzling stone bowl with our signature tonkotsu broth.
Deep fried prawns with crispy noodles topped with aurora sauce.
Nagi\'s vanilla ice cream served with 2 kinds of liquor.
Thinly sliced cucumber seasoned with Nagi\'s special spices.
Freshly sliced cabbage and lettuce with fried crispy noodles generously topped with Nagi\'s special dressing and slices of cherry tomatoes.
Deep fried prawns served with tartar sauce.
Thinly sliced pork belly rolled with cheese and served with Nagi\'s original sauce.
Japanese rice cooked in special sauce topped with roasted pork and served with a delightful blend of soy sauce and mayo.
Japanese fried chicken perfectly marinated in special sauce. Deep fried in special breading and served with a dip of mayo mustard.
A mixture of ground pork, vegetables, vermicelli and curry wrapped in rice paper then deep fried until golden brown.
Made of our special dough, fried to perfection and flavored in special Japanese seasoning.

string-array.name: menu_descriptions2
string-array.item: In the region of Kyushu, it is common for people to enjoy another serving of noodles.
Flavored egg - one of Nagi\'s classic trademarks.

string-array.name: menu_descriptions3
string-array.item: Our homemade Nagi iced tea served ice cold.
Authentic Japanese beer served ice cold.
